name: Mitchell Turner
title: Awesome Service!
testimonial: My PC was recently hit by a power surge and I needed to replace some parts. I decided to reach out to Alex since I have not been keeping up on all the latest and greatest equipment. Alex asked all of the right questions and found out what I needed in order for my PC to perform to my standards. I ordered all of the parts and couldn’t be happier. Everything is working great and I am extremely satisfied with his recommendations. Alex will always be my go to when it comes to PC, Network and overall tech hardware.

name: Kris
title: Top Tier Service
testimonial: Alex helped us setup the network for our small business, and also helped us find the right computers to fit our needs. Saved us from wasting time and money trying to figure it out ourselves.

name: Trystan Splena
title: Great Service
testimonial: Extremely concise and affordable PC service. Helped me choose and install parts. Worked with my schedule to get the job done.

name: Quick and Painless
title: Great Service
testimonial: Recently decided to upgrade my local network, alex showed me the best equipment for what I needed then walked me through the entire setup process over the phone because I live several states away. Eveything went quick my network got setup all my smart devices connected and worked like they should.

name: Steven Pullam
title: Need a new PC? Use this man!
testimonial: I had a stock PC that i was using for a long time and it was time to build a new one from scratch. Helped me find really good parts that would be high quality while fitting in my quasi-budget as well. And further still, when actually putting the PC together, continue to provide support as needed to get the thing working. And it works flawlessly!

name: Luke Haverstein
title: Knows his stuff
testimonial: Hired this guy to build me a PC and he worked with budget and made it nice! Have had zero issues with the build and couldn’t have been more happy thank you!

name: Tiffany Dunn
title: 5 stars! Alex has quickly..
testimonial: 5 stars! Alex has quickly and easily resolved each issue on our personal devices as well as enhancing the performance of our work assigned devices.

name: RAH
title: Exceptional service
testimonial: Alex took the time to understand my expectations for my home WiFi network. He made recommendations based on my budget and ultimately installed something I’m extremely satisfied with.

name: Justin
title: Thank You!
testimonial: 10 out of 10, reliable and accurate. Anytime I have had a problem Alex has resolved it

name: Joe Slovak
title: Great!
testimonial: 10 out of 10, reliable and accurate. Anytime I have had a problem Alex has resolved it

name: Hudson Moser
title: Great customer service
testimonial: response time and patient when i dont know how to describe my tech problems well
